MemberSignature.Value: abstract member GetExpandableListPosition : int -> int64 override this.GetExpandableListPosition : int -> int64
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 GetExpandableListPosition(int32 flatListPosition) cil managed

Docs.param: The flat list position to be converted.
Docs.summary: Converts a flat list position (the raw position of an item (child or group) in the list) to a group and/or child position (represented in a packed position).
Docs.returns: The group and/or child position for the given flat list position in packed position representation. #PACKED_POSITION_VALUE_NULL if the position corresponds to a header or a footer item.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: abstract member GetFlatListPosition : int64 -> int override this.GetFlatListPosition : int64 -> int
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetFlatListPosition(int64 packedPosition) cil managed

Docs.param: The group and/or child positions to be converted in packed position representation. Use #getPackedPositionForChild(int, int) or #getPackedPositionForGroup(int).
Docs.summary: Converts a group and/or child position to a flat list position.
Docs.returns: The flat list position for the given child or group.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 GetPackedPositionChild(int64 packedPosition) cil managed

Docs.param: The packed position from which the child position will be returned.
Docs.summary: Gets the child position from a packed position that is of #PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_CHILD type (use #getPackedPositionType(long)).
Docs.returns: The child position portion of the packed position. If this does not contain a child, returns -1.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype Android.Widget.PackedPositionType GetPackedPositionType(int64 packedPosition) cil managed

Docs.param: The packed position for which to return the type.
Docs.summary: Gets the type of a packed position.
Docs.returns: The type of the position contained within the packed position, either #PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_CHILD, #PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_GROUP, or #PACKED_POSITION_TYPE_NULL.

Docs.summary: Gets the ID of the currently selected group or child.
Docs.value: The ID of the currently selected group or child. -1 if no selection.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the position of the currently selected group or child (along with its type).
Docs.value: A packed position containing the currently selected group or child's position and type. #PACKED_POSITION_VALUE_NULL if no selection or if selection is on a header or a footer item.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetIndicatorBounds(int32 left, int32 right) cil managed

Docs.param: The left position (relative to the left bounds of this View) to start drawing the indicator.
The right position (relative to the left bounds of this View) to end the drawing of the indicator.
Docs.summary: Sets the drawing bounds for the indicators (at minimum, the group indicator is affected by this; the child indicator is affected by this if the child indicator bounds are set to inherit).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
